name: TheAlmighty
description:
Our hero has to save the day yet again!

But he seems to have become disinterested and clumsy lately... maybe it's time to give him a raise

This is Team 1 - Almighty's submission for McGame Jam 2021.

Contact

Hongjun Chen - nanjingchj#6822 - hongjun.chen2@mail.mcgill.ca

Credit

Programming: Tommy Lizotte, Hongjun Chen, Rencurel Pierre

Art: Rosalie Boivin, some unidentified npc on our team

Sound: Josy Voyance, De Vieille Roche
